title: enable debugging for xbox in xbox device portal.
body:
Currently there is no way to collect console logs of an installed UWP app from xbox. It would be good to have an option in xbox device portal so that we can see the javascript console logs like network logs in HTTP monitor tab.
Also it would be great if there is an option to inspect and debug.
